name: Levels and Ranks
flavor: Now, would you look at this shiny badge?
text:
A level up always requires 100 Experience Points. Experience can be earned by going on quests, participating in events, or rolepaying. 
Whenever you level up, you gain 1 stat point to increase your combat stats, up to their cap. (If a stat is capped, see Limit Breaking). 

Furthermore, Levels decide your guild rank and when you can evolve:
Level 2 => Silver
Level 3 => Evo #1
Level 4 => Gold
Level 6 => Evo #2
Level 8 => Platinum
Level 16 => Diamond

Every time you rank up you gain 2 social stat points along with an extra d6 on `+ rank accuracy` rolls.
Every time you rank up (including bronze rank) you learn 1 Egg move. Your first Egg move on bronze can only have a maximum power of 3. If you cannot learn a new move from the Egg move list, you instead pick a move from your Tutor move list, and if you cannot learn a new move from there, you instead pick a move from your TM list.
For platinum rank, you additionally learn 3 moves from your TM or Tutor move list.
